description:
Are you angered, depressed, and want reconnect with life after losing a loved one? If you have lost someone, this is the course for you. There are 10 affirmations in morning that are proven to start your day on the correct foot. I have laid these out in a clear and concise way.

My lectures are not long, yet I am clear with what I expect from you before we move on.

You will learn

  • reconnect after losing someone you love
  • how to bring the person you lost up in conversations without it becoming awkward
  • Strategies for grief recovery
  • take the anger that you feel and point it to something purposeful
title: Grief Recovery for people who have lost a loved one.
